## Sexual dimorphism

Does flipper length differ by sex?

```{r}
penguins_no_na <- penguins %>% filter(!is.na(sex))
#removes data with "NA"

penguins_no_na %>% ggplot(aes(x=species, y=flipper_length_mm))+
  geom_point(aes(color=sex))+
  theme_classic()+
  ylab("flipper length (mm)")
```
